content_info.title: Cooku with Comali
content_info.description: When cooking chaos meets comic charm! Comalis pair up with stars for a rib-tickling contest, judged by chefs Damu, Koushik Shankar and Madhampatty Rangaraj.

content_info.title: Tourist Family
content_info.description: Seeking refuge in Tamil Nadu, Das and his family face tough trials. However, through acts of kindness, they find the home and hope they never imagined.

content_info.title: Y2K
content_info.description: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives.

content_info.title: The Holiday Shift
content_info.description: A group of friends who work together at an upscale mall in Love, Ohio learn that love always wins in this romantic and cinematic comedy set during a magical holiday season.

content_info.title: Predator: Killer of Killers
content_info.description: This original animated anthology set in the Predator universe, follows three of the fiercest warriors in human history.

content_info.title: Thendrale Mella Pesu
content_info.description: Brave-hearted Ilamathi is caught between a daring cop and a reckless goon. In this tangled triangle, will her heart survive the storm?

content_info.title: Dashakada Mahotsava
content_info.description: A decade of Colors Kannada calls for a grand celebration! Don’t miss a night of unforgettable performances and a heartfelt tribute to Dr. Shiva Rajkumar.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter
content_info.description: One murder victim, two prime suspects, and everyone belongs to the same family. It's up to Advocate Madhav Mishra to unravel this 'straightforward' case.

alt.label: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter, Show

content_info.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
content_info.description: The world’s leading natural historian draws on a lifetime of knowledge to reveal how Earth’s vast, interconnected waterways can be restored.

content_info.title: Thendrale Mella Pesu
content_info.description: Brave-hearted Ilamathi is caught between a daring cop and a reckless goon. In this tangled triangle, will her heart survive the storm?

content_info.title: Tu Dhadkan Main Dil
content_info.description: Anupama, the ‘Sarvagunn Sampanna’, is everyone’s favourite! But can she deal with Bachha Party’s burning questions? Find out in this special chat show.

content_info.title: Tourist Family
content_info.description: Seeking refuge in Tamil Nadu, Das and his family face tough trials. However, through acts of kindness, they find the home and hope they never imagined.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter
content_info.description: One murder victim, two prime suspects, and everyone belongs to the same family. It's up to Advocate Madhav Mishra to unravel this 'straightforward' case.

content_info.title: Cooku with Comali
content_info.description: When cooking chaos meets comic charm! Comalis pair up with stars for a rib-tickling contest, judged by chefs Damu, Koushik Shankar and Madhampatty Rangaraj.

content_info.title: Heart Beat
content_info.description: Reena has become Reena 2.0, Radhi has embraced a new full-time role, and new interns have joined RK Multispeciality to bring fresh rhythm and beats to the hospital.

content_info.title: Noyontara
content_info.description: With a gift of seeing the spirit world, Noyon’s life equals a spooky adventure! When she marries into the Sengupta family, a history of dark secrets unravels.

content_info.title: Hai Junoon! Dream. Dare. Dominate.
content_info.description: When music maestro Gagan backs the Supersonics, underdog Sebi and his dance crew, The Misfits, rise to challenge legacy on the GOATs stage.

content_info.title: Office
content_info.description: Two types of work ethics clash when analogue meets digital in a rural government workplace, propelling the mundane to hilarious.

content_info.title: Anupama
content_info.description: From broken ambitions to changing relationships, Anupama has seen it all! A new journey brings her to the dreamy Mumbai. Will her passion find a new home?

content_info.title: Yeh Rishta
content_info.description: Destiny made Abhira and Armaan part ways! As the two navigate lost love and new worlds, will their daughter Maira pave the way for AbhiMaan’s reunion?

content_info.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey
content_info.description: After the death of their beloved ones, Neil and Savi’s world shatters! Navigating lost love and shared grief, will the two embrace a new beginning?

content_info.title: Laughter Chefs Unlimited Entertainment
content_info.description: Culinary comedy returns! Six celebrity couples showcase their unique dynamics in a kitchen setting and compete for the top prize.

content_info.title: Udne Ki Aasha
content_info.description: A dreamy-eyed Sayali yearns for her prince charming. But when destiny ties her with hero-cum-thug Sachin, will her hopes for a fairytale life prevail?

content_info.title: Siragadikka Aasai
content_info.description: Circumstances force Meena, a family-centric girl, to marry Muthu, a thug. Will this unfortunate marriage turn into love?

content_info.title: Mannat - Har Khushi Paane Ki
content_info.description: Abandoned and gifted, Mannat becomes a chef, unaware her boss is her mother. Secrets and betrayal test her strength. Will she find her destiny?

content_info.title: Karthika Deepam
content_info.description: Unfortunate events force Deepa to arrive at Karthik's doorstep with her daughter Sourya. Will fate smile upon her and grant her a second chance at life?

content_info.title: Jaadu Teri Nazar
content_info.description: He is a Daavansh who holds keys to Daayan’s immortality! She’s Rewavanshi, the chosen one. Meant to be enemies, what happens when they fall in love?

content_info.title: Jhanak
content_info.description: Keeping her mother’s fiery spirit intact, young Jhanak lives an idyllic life, unaware of the past. When dashing cop Rishi enters her world, a new saga begins!

content_info.title: Pocket Mein Aasman
content_info.description: After a harrowing separation, strong-willed Rani embraces new life with her daughter. Navigating motherhood, lost love and big dreams, what lies ahead of her?

content_info.title: Ninja Hattori - New
content_info.description: Young ninja Hattori and his brother safeguard Kenichi, aided by their loyal ninja dog. Friendship and loyalty are tested in the Iga mountains.

content_info.title: Mangal Lakshmi
content_info.description: Strong-willed Mangal embarks on a quest to find a perfect match for her sister Lakshmi. This journey tests the bond of their sisterhood.

content_info.title: Pandian Stores 2
content_info.description: Pandian's life revolves around his big happy family. When his children get entangled with rivals, will their strong family bonds endure destiny's trials?

content_info.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
content_info.description: Every underdog has its day! Struggling lawyer Anjali Awasthi takes up a challenging case, all set for her big break. But can she fight the big guns?

content_info.title: MTV Roadies
content_info.description: After 19 seasons, Roadies is back! Season 20, Roadies XX, introduces a thrilling new element: betrayal. Expect the unexpected.

content_info.title: Gunde Ninda Gudi Gantalu
content_info.description: Circumstances force Meena, a family-centric girl, to marry Balu, a thug. Will this unfortunate marriage turn into love?

content_info.title: Parineetii
content_info.description: A new saga! Strong-willed Preet is the shadow of her mother, Pari. But when a revenge-seeking Neeti enters her life, will she be able to keep up the fight?

content_info.title: Ram Bhavan
content_info.description: Jilted Isha rebuilds her life at Jai Ram Bhavan, where she inspires Om to defy controlling Gayatri and restore his family’s legacy. Will love win over evil?

content_info.title: RadhaKrishn
content_info.description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.
